ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Some M-estimators for 1-dimensional location (Bisquare, ML for the Cauchy distribution, and the estimators from application of the smoothing principle introduced in Hampel, Hennig and Ronchetti (2011) to the above, the Huber M-estimator, and the median, main function is smoothm), and Pitman estimator.

Some M-estimators for 1-dimensional location (Bisquare, ML for the Cauchy distribution, and the estimators from application of the smoothing principle introduced in Hampel, Hennig and Ronchetti (2011) to the above, the Huber M-estimator, and the median, main function is smoothm), and Pitman estimator.

name: r-smoothmest
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1-3" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-smoothmest
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: smoothmest_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/smoothmest_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/smoothmest/smoothmest_{{ version }}.tar.gz

  sha256: 3af2f0786b5d29b1f5cb7cc7a007d6efd616f34dea6afe5e3f6c509b368f13d5

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - r-mass

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('smoothmest')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('smoothmest')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/smoothmest/index.html
  license: GPL
  summary: Some M-estimators for 1-dimensional location (Bisquare, ML for the Cauchy distribution, and the estimators from application of the smoothing principle introduced in Hampel, Hennig and Ronchetti (2011) to the above, the Huber M-estimator, and the median, main function is smoothm), and Pitman estimator.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
